title: All news — Official web site of the President of Ukraine
snippet: 15 December 2025 - 15:17 · On the occasion of Court Employees’ Day, President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenskyy signed decrees appointing judges to local and appellate courts following the results of open competitions.

title: Zelenskyy sets out Ukraine’s red lines in press conference with Macron – as it happened | Ukraine | The Guardian
snippet: In his comments, Macron also notes that Ukraine has been open to various proposals on ceasefire and ending the war throughout 2025, with Russia repeatedly blocking them from progressing.

title: November 25, 2025 – Ukraine war news | CNN
snippet: ... In this photo provided by the Ukrainian Presidential Press Office, Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky shakes hands with US Army Secretary Dan Driscoll in Kyiv, Ukraine, on November 20.

title: Ukraine drops NATO goal as Trump envoy sees progress in peace talks | Reuters
snippet: REUTERS/Kylie Cooper Purchase Licensing Rights, opens new tab ... BERLIN/KYIV, Dec 14 (Reuters) - President Volodymyr Zelenskiy offered to drop Ukraine's aspirations to join the NATO military alliance as he held five hours of talks with U.S.

title: Zelenskyy says Ukraine ready for elections in 60-90 days with guarantees | Fox News
snippet: Zelenskyy said Ukraine could be ready for its first election since Russia's 2022 invasion if international partners provide security guarantees.
